attributes.action: reform the Carers Allowance and to make it a fair and just benefit for all carers.  In particular we ask:  (1) that the rules which prevent Carers Allowance being paid to those receiving an equivalent amount of retirement pension or incapacity benefit should be ended;  and (2) that the earnings rule be changed to a sliding scale, so that carers do not suddenly lose all of their Carers Allowance when they earn more than a given amount.
